author: Nintendo of America
description:
Persona 3 Reload Demo is available now on Nintendo Switch 2. Your save data from the demo will carry over to the full game once it releases on Oct 23, 2025: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/persona-3-reload-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Enter the Dark Hour where the line between ordinary and supernatural blur. Step into the shoes of a transfer student thrust into an unexpected fate when entering the hour "hidden" between one day and the next. Awaken an incredible power and chase the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fight for your friends, and leave a mark on their memories forever.   
 
Persona 3 Reload is a captivating reimagining of the genre-defining RPG, reborn for the modern era on Nintendo Switch 2. 

#Persona3Reload #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAme
title: Persona 3 Reload – Demo Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
KPop Demon Hunters arrive in Fortnite on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fortnite-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-01&utm_id=P1064-01   

It’s time to seal the honmoon in Fortnite as KPop Demon Hunters HUNTR/X are jumping from the stage to the Island!  
 
Drive back legions of demons in Demon Rush while new items and consumables arrive in Battle Royale and Blitz.  

#Fortnite #NintendoSwitch  #NintendoSwitch2

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Fortnite – KPop Demon Hunters – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode three of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments like Trivia Time!, and interview questions with Riptide 2025 attendees.

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #3 livestream on Saturday, Oct 4th at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/ykhUcDkOxr0

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. 
nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Facebook: https://www.facebo
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 3
